item.description:
Due to the predicted rain, I am rescheduling the walk.

Roaring Brook Nature Center has over 100 acres of woods and trails for recreation and nature study. We will walk through several trails to make a big loop around Werner’s Woods. There are several trails blazed in various colors, and a guide book is available in the gift shop. The nature center has many public programs of nature study and education throughout the year.

You may visit the center after our walk if you like. Admission is $5 for adults, $4 for seniors.

This will be an easy walk of about 2 to 3 miles with some uphill climbs. Social walking pace. We will be out for 2 hours. Rain cancels. Dogs unfortunately are not allowed. They will scare the wildlife no matter how well behaved they are. (Local rules)

Location: 76 Gracey Rd, Canton, CT.
http://maps.yahoo.com...

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Roaring Brook Nature Center Walk, Canton, CT
